00021 {
00022 protected:
00023 
00026   const Dimension frequency;
00027

00030 
00031 public:
00050   RandomFreqTimeModel(int seed = 23):
00051     frequency("frequency"),
00052     dimensions(Dimension::time, frequency) {
00053 
00054     //sets the seed for random number generation. The PhyLayer
00055     //(which created the analogue models) gets the seed from the
00056     //configuration parameters inside the xml-config
00057     srand(seed);
00058   }
